title: Crayola to Retree'Dandelion's colored chalk because of White House pressure?
subtitle: The claim that the White House asked Crayola to drop Dandelion's paint because the kids were using it to create unexplored images of President Trump was cheerful.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Crayola announced that they were removing the color of "the Dandelion" from their 24-cray basic box because of a complaint from the White House that the children were using it to make incandescent images of President Trump.
